動物用藥品名稱: 生化雞傳染性支氣管炎活毒疫苗
效能(適應症): 雞：預防傳染性支氣管炎。
ingredients: A LIVE ATTENUATED STRAIN OF INFECTIOUS BRONCHITIS VIRUS (MASSTYPE, HOLLAND STRAIN).EACH VIAL CONTAINS:1. BULK VIRUS   50%     2. STABILIZER   50%POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE   0.01%    MONOSODIUM GLUTAMATE  0.04%POTASSIUM PHOSPHATE, MONOBASIC    0.03%POTASSIUM PHOSPHATE, DIBASIC      0.06%     N-Z AMINE  10%LACTOSE    10%          D.I. WATER    Q.S. TO 100%3. PRESERVATIVES: GENTAMICIN    0.003%
